definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行，开始于迈出第一步前那口自信的深呼吸。

sentences.english: The first step is to understand that self-esteem is your opinion of yourself.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是要理解自尊是你对你自己的看法。

sentences.english: This first volume reveals the crucial initial steps for getting a short film off the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这是首卷，展现了一个上下车短片关键的第一步。

sentences.english: Naturally, but that is only step one.
sentences.chinese: 自然，不过那只是第一步。

sentences.english: The first test they did was with a virus dose of one nanogram.
sentences.chinese: 他们做先将1纳克剂量的病毒做为实验的第一步。

sentences.english: We had to bring out the powerful Cheerio box to get her take the first step.
sentences.chinese: 我们就只有拿出燕麦圈，派托佳佳迈上第一步。

sentences.english: Knowing that these thoughts are there is an important first stage in overcoming attention-seeking behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 要克服注意力寻求的行为第一步是觉察这类的想法。

sentences.english: The initial stabilization for a leaking cylinder containing corrosives is isolation in a well-ventilated area.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是把装有腐蚀剂的钢瓶隔离在通风良好的区域。

sentences.english: You can imagine that this demo would only be the first step in providing visibility.
sentences.chinese: 可以想象得到，本演示仅仅是提供可见性的第一步。

sentences.english: The first is an opt-out from social and employment legislation.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一步就是部分退出社会与就业相关条例。

sentences.english: You can return to the first step from the third step to update an inventory of assets to be protected.
sentences.chinese: 可以从第三步返回到第一步以更新要保护的资产集。

sentences.english: In this first step, the customer data is checked.
sentences.chinese: 在此第一步中，选中客户数据。

sentences.english: I noticed when I took my first step inside . I bumped my head on the doorframe .
sentences.chinese: 我刚踏进第一步时就领教了，我一头撞在了门框上。

sentences.english: And that’s the first step to the kind of body confidence that lasts.
sentences.chinese: 这就是建立信心中贯穿始末的第一步。

sentences.english: But these reforms should be only the first step.
sentences.chinese: 可这些改革仅仅只是第一步。

sentences.english: Used before cosmetics, it forms a perfect base of makeup.
sentences.chinese: 妆前使用，打造完美底妆第一步。

definition: to open/to show (a ticket)/to turn on/to switch on
to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
